I want to build a mobile dating app. Include user profiles, matching algorithm, messaging, location features, and safety tools.  “Intentional” is a new dating app that is exclusive, has no “likes or swipes” (you show interest by starting a conversation which will require a minimum of 36 characters), you get limited daily matches, and in an industry first, every person allowed into the “Intentional” community is verified.  Our verification badges are also different, it is NOT a blue check mark but rather you pick a “status” and provide proof that is manually verified by Intentional staff.  For example, if you apply for a “student” verification badge, you will need to submit a selfie with your student ID card held to your face as proof you are actually a student.  Once you are approved for your status, your blue status badge will say “student”, as an example, on the bottom right corner of your profile picture.  There will be three status levels; basic (blue), elite (purple), and star(gold).  These levels are dependent on the status you are applying for.  You apply for up to three statuses per tier and can technically have up to nine status badges (3 from each tier)

Another differentiating quality of the Intentional Dating App is that we have a strict onboarding process on helping people create quality profiles.  No more group pictures or grainy pictures from far away.  Intentional will require a very high, basic set of standards which if the applicant doesn’t meet, they will not be allowed into the community.  Minimum requirement is a selfie with no sun glasses on, full body picture without baggy clothes or jacket, and three activity pictures with only you in it.  There is also an application process to get into our community.  Every new community member must be approved manually by Intentional staff.

Finally, regarding matches and conversations, we are approaching things differently.  You only get a limited amount of matches per day.  There is no liking or swiping, if you like someone, you must start a conversation with them (minimum 36 characters).  We do this intentionally to make it as though you were meeting someone in real life and you have to go talk to them to introduce yourself.  Also, to prevent ghosting, the receiver has to reply with either at least two characters or press our “End Conversation” button which permanently ends the conversation and neither party can make further communication.  This is designed to prevent harassment.

Also, in order to get matched, community members must clear their conversations every 24 hours before they can browse through matches and start new communications.  If the conversation is going nowhere, either community member has the option to “End Conversation” which will inform the other community member with “This person no longer wants to talk.  It’s time to move on.” and cease any further communication.  This will prevent harassment and also “closes the loop” without the ghosting.  Community members must make a decision to advance the conversation by messaging back and forth (no double messaging) or end the conversation.  

We are building a dating app with a similar UI to Raya but with our status badges and with a much more rigorous on-boarding process.

Okay, I understand. You're building "Intentional," a unique dating app focused on verified identities, quality profiles, and intentional conversations, drawing inspiration from Raya's UI but with significant differences. Here's a plan to get started:

**Features for the First Version:**

*   **Profile Creation & Verification:** Implement the rigorous onboarding process, including selfie, full body, and activity picture uploads. Develop the status badge system with Basic (Blue), Elite (Purple), and Star (Gold) tiers, and manual verification by staff.
*   **Matching & Conversation:** Develop the limited daily match system. Implement the "start a conversation" approach (minimum 36 characters) instead of likes/swipes. Include the "End Conversation" button and the 24-hour conversation clearing rule.
*   **User Interface:** Design a UI inspired by Raya, but incorporating the status badges on profile pictures. Focus on a clean, exclusive aesthetic.

## 🎯 Key Features Implemented:

### 1. **Exclusive Verification System**
- Three-tier status badge system: Basic (Blue), Elite (Purple), and Star (Gold)
- Users can have up to 9 badges (3 per tier)
- Status badges displayed on profile pictures
- Manual verification by staff (simulated in the UI)

### 2. **No Likes/Swipes - Conversation-First Approach**
- Users must start a conversation with a minimum of 36 characters to show interest
- No traditional swiping mechanism
- Thoughtful conversation starters encouraged with examples

### 3. **Limited Daily Matches**
- Users get a limited number of matches per day (currently showing 3)
- Must clear active conversations before viewing new matches
- 24-hour conversation clearing rule enforced

### 4. **Rigorous Onboarding Standards**
- Profile photos categorized as: Selfie, Full Body, and Activity
- Quality standards enforced (shown in profile display)
- Verification badges prominently displayed

### 5. **Anti-Ghosting Features**
- "End Conversation" button to respectfully close conversations
- No double messaging allowed
- Must respond or end conversation to move forward
- Visual indicators for whose turn it is to respond

### 6. **Safety & Community Tools**
- Safety Center access
- Report functionality
- Community Guidelines
- Verified user badges

### 7. **Beautiful Raya-Inspired UI**
- Clean, minimalist design with the specified color palette
- Elegant profile cards with gradient overlays
- Status badges integrated into profile pictures
- Smooth animations and transitions
- Professional typography and spacing

## 📱 App Structure:

**Main Screens:**
- **Matches Tab**: Browse daily matches, view profiles, start conversations
- **Chats Tab**: Manage active conversations with anti-ghosting features
- **Profile Tab**: View and edit your profile, manage status badges

**Additional Screens:**
- **Profile Detail**: Full profile view with photo gallery
- **Start Conversation**: Compose thoughtful first messages (36+ chars)
- **Chat**: Real-time messaging with conversation rules

## 🎨 Design Highlights:

- **Colors**: Slate Blue primary, Lavender accents, Gold for Star badges
- **Status Badges**: Color-coded by tier, displayed prominently
- **Profile Cards**: Large, beautiful cards with gradient overlays
- **Typography**: Clean, modern fonts with proper hierarchy
- **Spacing**: Breathable design with proper padding

## 🔐 Safety Features:

- Verified community badges
- Manual staff verification system
- Report and safety tools
- Community guidelines access
- Respectful conversation ending

The app is fully functional with mock data and ready for backend integration. All the unique features of "Intentional" are implemented, including the exclusive verification system, conversation-first approach, and anti-ghosting mechanisms!
